name: Adult Spot the Differences
description:
We would like to introduce you the first real adult game for iPhone! The concept of this game is in finding differences between two pictures. Many of us played in Spot the Differences game. If you like such games and you are 17+ then you will definetely like Adult Spot the Difference!

You can see version of this game for computers on site www.findherdifferences.com (it's free!). And now you can play this game on your iPhone or iPod! Don't miss this chance.
